mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.building as building ,a.unit as unit ,a.room as room ,a.fangjian_content as fangjianContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_content as yonghuContent
FROM fangjian a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.building like CONCAT('%',#{params.building},'%')
and a.unit like CONCAT('%',#{params.unit},'%')
and a.room like CONCAT('%',#{params.room},'%')
and a.fangjian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangjianContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
